item.title: Digital Currencies Are Bringing to Reality Hayek's Free Market Money
item.description:
Digital Currencies Are Bringing to Reality Hayek's Free Market Money

"When one studies the history of money one cannot help wondering why people should have put up for so long with governments exercising an exclusive power over 2,000 years that was regularly used to exploit and defraud them.

item.title: What are the best tools for blockchain development?
item.description:
What are the best tools for blockchain development?

I was 16 and I was at the dermatologist. I had to be seen by a doctor every so often in between getting facials, so the visit was just routine. My doctor was a (relatively) older woman, probably in her late sixties. I honestly didn't like her much, as her attitude was fickle.

item.title: Code is Law? Not Quite Yet - CoinDesk
item.description:
Code is Law? Not Quite Yet - CoinDesk

Lukas Abegg is a lawyer with master's degrees in Swiss and US law. He is currently a visiting researcher at the Humboldt University in Berlin, where he is writing a PhD thesis on a topic at the intersection of law and technology.

item.title: Uber Reports Big Losses Caused by Growth First Business Model
item.description:
Uber Reports Big Losses Caused by Growth First Business Model

Uber reported losses of over $1.2 billion during the first six months of 2016, indicating a changing ridesharing landscape. This massive shortfall, according to Uber's head of finance Gautam Gupta, is caused by driver subsidies.

item.title: Bitmain's R4 To Bring An In-Home Experience to Bitcoin Mining
item.description:
Bitmain's R4 To Bring An In-Home Experience to Bitcoin Mining

Leading mining hardware manufacturer Bitmain has recently unveiled its latest mining rig: the Antminer R4. This machine aims to bring bitcoin mining back to the home. Available for purchase on August 29, Bitmain claims the launch will make the R4 the world's most efficient bitcoin mining chip in the consumer market.

item.title: Bitcoin Becomes More Appealing To Mainstream Investors
item.description:
Bitcoin Becomes More Appealing To Mainstream Investors

As it turns out, some people strongly feel Bitcoin is an asset well worth investing in. That is, once takes all of the different opportunities and risks into account. Both consumers and big investors can find a certain appeal in Bitcoin; that much is certain.

item.title: BlockPay to Host ICO on OpenLedger Cryptocurrency Exchange
item.description:
BlockPay to Host ICO on OpenLedger Cryptocurrency Exchange

BlockPay, a cryptocurrency payment solutions provider, has announced an ICO to raise funds for development. Set to open in early 2017, the ICO will be hosted by OpenLedger, who is already administering a pre-ICO that went live on August 23. Disclaimer: This article was sponsored by Bitcoin PR Buzz.

item.title: The Vault: Could This Technical Fix Block Bitcoin Hackers? - CoinDesk
item.description:
The Vault: Could This Technical Fix Block Bitcoin Hackers? - CoinDesk

Cryptsy, Shapeshift, Gatecoin, Bitfinex. What do all these exchanges have in common? More than 130,000 BTC ($73,818,875 at today's prices) has collectively been stolen from them in 2016. Hacks and heists at bitcoin exchanges happen so often that it's becoming less surprising when a new one takes place.

item.title: Satoshi Citadel Industries Acquires Bitcoin Based Investment App, Keza - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Satoshi Citadel Industries Acquires Bitcoin Based Investment App, Keza - NEWSBTC

Satoshi Citadel Industries, the Filipino Bitcoin heavyweight has announced the acquisition of Keza Bitcoin investment application. Read more... READ MORE: Bitcoin Investment Platform Keza is No More Satoshi Citadel Industries, the Philippines-based Bitcoin company has added yet another feather to its cap.
